author: sfgate.com
title: Minerva's Sunday Horoscope: 10/25/15
text:
Starcast 
The Halloween cauldron bubbles as the full moon lights up Taurus while eyeballing the sun in scintillating Scorpio. Oh, the possibilites. Brace yourself. That ghostie in a bedsheet is going to say more than "boo!"
ARIES (March 20-April 18)  Come Monday the fateful full moon lights your bonfire. Bubble, bubble toil and trouble. Your financial life is a seething stew. Laugh if you want to — it's a cool way to keep your teeth from chattering, but be certain to say a well-chosen spell or two.
TAURUS (April 19-May 19)  Better believe the full moon carries a mandate. On Monday it beams directly on you. This is your time to howl, Taurbabe. Wh ! The crystal pulses big time. That old black magic has you in its spell. Icy fingers up and down your spine suggests a romantic encounter.
GEMINI (May 20-June 20)  The full moon bobs for apples in your "mystery" house, a bell tolls. Do no ask ... it tolls for thee, a date with destiny. It's time to lay a ghost to rest. Bury it once and for all. Consider the roads traveled and count your blessings. Play your Tarot cards right and Turkey Day will be a true Thanksgiving with plenty to gobble about.
Related Stories Minerva's Sunday Horoscope: 10/25/15 Horoscope for Saturday, 10/24/15 by Christopher Renstrom Horoscope for Friday, 10/23/15 by Christopher Renstrom Horoscope for Thursday, 10/22/15 by Christopher Renstrom Horoscope for Wednesday, 10/21/15 by Christopher Renstrom CANCER June 21-July 21)  The fateful full moon conspires to bring a long-term dream into focus. Yes, it can come true. A friend or colleague is involved — possibly a closet witch or warlock. Just be careful — very, very careful — that your heart's desire isn't more trick than treat.
LEO (July 22-Aug.22)  Repeat this magic incantation: "Every day in every way, I'm growing richer and richer. Every day in ..." The treat is coming, you can be certain of that. The trick involves hanging on to it. Does anyone enjoy the good life more than you — pricey restaurants, designer duds, luxury digs? It's called high maintenance and costs money. But you know that.
VIRGO (Aug. 23-Sept. 22)  Explore a haunted house. Get your palm read. Buy a Tarot deck. The Great Pumpkin has tagged you for a walk on the wild side. Tread softly, wear a big smile and promise not to hex anyone. Remember: What goes around, comes around.
LIBRA (Sept.23-Oct.22)  Your flirtatious manner and ready wit mask so much. Few suspect the witch/warlock lurking behind that bubbly facade. The full moon suggests a canny move in the finance department. This week a simple mission statement can work like an incantation.
SCORPIO (Oct.23-Nov.21)  Your creativity stretches in a manner that only another Scorp can fully appreciate. Now's the time to light those black candles. Cut yourself a slice of devil's food. Make a wish and make it happen. Halloween's your night to howl. It's the time of your life.
SAGITTARIUS (Nov. 22-Dec. 20)  The crystal pulses big time as the full moon turns a blazing light on shared resources. Satan pokes you lightly with his pitchfork, a devilish reminder of a trick that only you can pull off. Easy does it, a hand caught in the cosmic cookie jar is not a pleasant sight.
CAPRICORN (Dec.21-Jan.19)  With the full moon mixing it up in your playhouse, you're set for center stage billing. Will you play the daring devil? The seductive sorceress? Or just "Whoooo! Whooo!" with a chorus clad in a satin bed sheets? Whatever role you choose, it's your turn to howl.
AQUARIUS (Jan. 20-Feb.18)  Power planets converge on your nemesis, Scorpio, and chains begin to rattle. The cellar door squeaks open. Like it or not, the time has come for you to confront a family skeleton. Surely you've heard about what happens to she/he who hesitates. Just wave a sheet and yell boo!
PISCES (Feb.19-March 19)  It's one of those "wake up and taste the cider" moments. You can't please everyone. Time now to lay your Tarot cards on the table and play them one by one. Just promise Minerva, no curses. Halloween vibes are so intense.
Minerva's Mailbag 
Question: I'm an Aquarius with a rising sign in Cancer, Moon in Taurus. He's a Pisces. I'm having a difficult time going through a divorce. My new love is secretive, and I'm unsure about a lot, even though he says he loves me very much. Will we be together, have a future?
Answer: Will you have a future? Possibly, but you'll both have to work at it. A union of feeling and intellect is worth shooting for, but you must learn to recognize the madness and magic that your Pisces guy brings to the table. Saving the world is all very well as long as your slippery Fish doesn't swim off in search of a more intense, emotional lover.
